subject: Want to be the best with your girlfriend?
body:
Your lady can't have orgasms? Heh, body, it's your fault. Do you want to fix that?
Click here to be the best lover in the world!
We have only high-quality national medications at low prices. There is no need for someone to know about your sexual problems. 
Click here to be the best lover in the world!
Licensed medications! Confidential and secure purchase
With best regards,
John Case
 
 
V mozgu prozvuchal bezzvuchnyj signal opasnosti, i vhod v Leshu Srabotal na vysshem urovne. Konechno, srazu eto tebe ne Udastsia, no postepenno, esli ty budesh userdnym uchenikom, tvoj mozg Privyknet delat eto avtomaticheski. Kakaia sila mogla sozdat stol grandioznuiu pustotu v tolshche Skal? Slovno nekogda sverhu opustilas gigantskaia stupka, prodaviv Sootvetstvuiushchee otverstie v kamne. No traktirshchik iavlialsia dobrodushnejshim Sushchestvom. 
Sevren vytarashchil glaza, zastyv kak statuia. I mozhesh Otpustit on ne upadet. I mnogoznachitelno dobavila: Ty pojmesh eto, kogda uznaesh, kto on na Samom dele. Znaiu ia Nekotoryh shutnikov, kotorye probovali, tak ot nih malo chto ostalos. Ia pomahal Kengshu rukoj, vnutrenne zloradstvuia, chto on ne mozhet mne Otvetit tem zhe. Rad by, da ne mogu priniat predlozhenie. Poniatno. Da, inop? zadumchivo otozvalsia prygun. 
 Leshuk cherpaet iz nego Energiiu, koncentriruet ee, upravliaet. Celitel poerzal na sidene, vybiraia polozhenie poudobnee, i prokriahtel: Znaesh, Niks, on, v obshchem-to, neplohoj paren, nash Bigman shest. Nastolko bespechny, chto rezultat skazyvaetsia dazhe Spustia sotniu let. ejisuminyon Q1FUW1pVckRcUFBGHUFCUEZWRlleXR1XVA==
